creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red and green scrolled applique; top has center applique and embroidered design with small hearts in red, green and black; lower section has 2 small squares in same technique--hearts and swirls; border of narrow applied narrow tapes in red, orange, black, green, yellow; dark pieced lining
title: Baby Carrier
